dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Hssiss... Who daresss to intrude upon my domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, just passing through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Sssuch a weak approach. What do you seek in these landsss?
Knowledge? Adventuresss are not welcome here. Leave now or face the consssequencesss.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Sssmart choice. Next time think twice before tressspassing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I defy you, prepare to fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you will regret thissss...
Power? Domination? Such ambition... yet sssuch feeble strength. You amussse me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you for control of this domain.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? Bold move, mortal. Let usss sssee if you can back up your wordsss.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully, no need for conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful departure? Rare... very well, I shall allow it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no business with you, just passing by.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passing by? No one passsess through without a reason. State yoursss or leave at once.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the intrusion, I will be on my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologiesss accepted. Remember not to return unwelcomed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave until I find what I seek.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Persistent little thing, arent't you? Very well, face the consssequencesss.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to vanquish any who stand in my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Vanquish? Sssuch arrogance in thiss one. You may try, but you will sssuffer the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will show no mercy in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mercy is not in my vocabulary either. Let usss ssee who emerges victoriousss.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a chance to join me in conquest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join you? An interesting proposal... but I am the one who conqerss. Prepare to face your doom.
